list_ex_of_english: In short, people simply collected the money to give away to the landlord, the grocer, the baker, the candlestick-maker and so on.
You cannot tot these things up mathematically, and say how many butchers, bakers and candlestick makers and so on you need in each particular town.
The cobbler should stick to his last, and so must the butcher, the baker and the candlestick-maker stick to theirs.
The other consistent thread has been the remorseless pursuit of the short term, whether it be office blocks, oil paintings or gold candlesticks.
He then started to blame the butcher, the baker and the candlestick-maker for the lack of justice being done.
One wonders whether it also includes a candlestick maker and a butcher.
I inquired why there were lovely supermarkets but no greengrocer, no butcher, no baker, not even a candlestick maker.
That is why they invest large sums in things like silver gilt candlesticks.
